English: (idiom) to compare favorably with men in terms of ability, bravery etc

e: `如~：「`教育~`普及~`的~`結果~，`造成~`越~`來~`越~`多~`的~`女~`性工作者~`在~`工作~`表現~`上~`不讓鬚眉~。」
d.f: `形容~`女子~`處事~`能力~`不輸~`於~`男子~。

English: (idiom) to compare favorably with men in terms of ability, bravery etc
to be a match for men
lit. not conceding to men (beard and eyebrows)
